decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to quickly apply pressure on the opponent using efficient creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Dragon's Rage Channeler, backed up by removal spells like Unholy Heat and Lightning Bolt. The deck also includes disruption and protection in the form of Counterspell, Spell Pierce, and Spell Snare. The goal is to establish a fast clock and disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also maintaining card advantage through cards like Expressive Iteration and Mishra's Bauble. The deck is designed to be proactive and aggressive, aiming to close out games quickly.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combo between Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to mill through the library quickly and win the game with Thassa's Oracle. Tamiyo, Emry, and Mishra's Bauble provide card advantage and recursion to keep the combo going. Mox Amber and Urza's Saga help ramp up mana quickly, while Unholy Heat and Malevolent Rumble provide removal and disruption. The deck also includes a few flexible lands and artifacts to support the combo and protect against disruption. Overall, the key strategy is to assemble the combo pieces efficiently and win the game before the opponent can respond.

The deck focuses on controlling the board by using Eldrazi creatures and powerful spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. It utilizes ramp cards like Eldrazi Temple and Talisman of Impulse to quickly bring out massive threats like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Ulamog, the Defiler. Cards like All Is Dust and Kozilek's Command help to clear the opponent's board, while Sowing Mycospawn creates additional threats. The deck also includes cards like Through the Breach and Ugin's Labyrinth for additional win conditions and disruption.

This deck focuses on using cards like Indomitable Creativity and Transmogrify to bring out powerful creatures like Archon of Cruelty to overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes a combination of combo pieces and removal spells to disrupt the opponent's game plan while setting up its own win condition. The deck also includes cards that provide additional value and flexibility, such as Wrenn and Six for card advantage and Bitter Reunion for card filtering. Overall, the deck aims to be proactive and creative in its approach to winning the game.

This deck focuses on utilizing powerful reanimation spells like Goryo's Vengeance to bring back big threats like Griselbrand and Atraxa, Grand Unifier from the graveyard to the battlefield. By combining cards that can exile opponents' threats like Prismatic Ending and Solitude with cards that disrupt their hand like Thoughtseize, the deck aims to control the game while setting up its own explosive plays. Using cards like Fallaji Archaeologist and Tainted Indulgence to set up the graveyard and Ephemerate to maximize value, this deck looks to overwhelm opponents with powerful creatures and disruptive spells.

This aggro deck focuses on creating a fast and aggressive board presence with creatures like Amped Raptor, Guide of Souls, and Orcish Bowmasters. It also utilizes cards like Fatal Push and Galvanic Discharge to control the board and remove threats. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an extra layer of consistency to the deck. The deck aims to quickly overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells to secure a victory in a fast-paced Modern 1 vs 1 match.

This deck focuses on utilizing the combination of Underworld Breach and Grinding Station to create a powerful loop of recurring artifacts and spells from the graveyard. By utilizing cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Mishra's Bauble, the deck aims to quickly assemble the combo and win the game by milling the opponent or utilizing Thassa's Oracle as a win condition. The inclusion of Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Nadu, Winged Wisdom provide additional card advantage and control elements to help protect the combo and ensure victory.

This deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of aggressive creatures and powerful spells, with a focus on both dealing damage quickly and controlling the board. The inclusion of Jegantha, the Wellspring as a companion adds an additional layer of versatility to the deck. With a mix of creature removal, burn spells, and enchantments like Blood Moon and Static Prison, this Boros Aggro deck is designed to put pressure on the opponent early and maintain that pressure throughout the game.
